alert.note: Alert for Marion (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:30AM EDT until April 01 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marion County in north central Ohio... * Until 215 AM EDT. * At 130 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near La Rue, or near Kenton, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Marion, Prospect, La Rue, Morral, Waldo, Caledonia, New Bloomington, Green Camp and State Route 229 at US Route 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
